instance.description: Returns nodes with structures such as ACLs, routemaps, etc. that are defined but not used.
instance.longDescription: Return nodes with structures such as ACLs, routes, etc. that are defined but not used. This may represent a bug in the configuration, which may have occurred because a final step in a template or MOP was not completed. Or it could be harmless extra configuration generated from a master template that is not meant to be used on those nodes.

nodes.description: Look for unused structures on nodes matching this name or regex
